text: Merrill Community Schools is a school district headquartered in Merrill, Michigan. It is a part of the Saginaw Intermediate School District and serves the Merrill area, including the village of Merrill, Jonesfield and Lakefield townships, most of Marion Township. Its schools include Merrill Elementary School and Merrill Middle/High School. ==References== ==External links== * Merrill Community Schools Category:School districts in Michigan Category:Saginaw Intermediate School District
title: Merrill Community Schools
